items.title: Goldman Sachs Stays Strong Amid Market Turbulence, But Still Sensitive
items.description: Goldman Sachs remains a leader in M&A and trading, with strong Q1 2025 results despite a challenging market environment. Read why I rate GS stock as a Hold.
